textTemplates.name: emailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear Colleague,

A new sample order has been sent for your review.

Request Details

Order Number:{!$Record.OrderNumber}
Account:{!$Record.Account.Name}
Ship To:{!$Record.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Requestor:{!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}

Portal Information

End Customer:{!$Record.End_Customer__c}
Application:{!$Record.Application__c}
Potential Volume:{!$Record.Potential_Volume1__c}

Order Items

{!Get_Order_Products.Outputs.OrderItemTableRows}
Item NameQuantityUnit

Please review the order and take necessary action.

Best regards,

Your CRM Support Team

(This is an automated message from the mySalesforce system.)
